short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that calculates your ideal measurements and strength standards in key lifts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply enter your height and weight and The Kino Standards extension will go to work. It contains two tools.

The Physique Standards Tool - will give you your ideal waist, chest, leg, and arm measurements in inches or centimeters. 

The Strength Standards Tool - will show you the ideal weights to lift in these key lifts: Incline Bench Press, Weighted Chin-up, DB Shoulder Press, Bulgarian Split Squats.
